in2011.http

Class RequestMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • in2011.http.Message
      • in2011.http.RequestMessage

  • public class RequestMessage
extends Message
    The part of an HTTP request message before the message body (if any). See RFC 2616 Section 4.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class in2011.http.Message

        CR, CRLF, DEFAULT_HTTP_VERSION, headers, LF, version
